short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily add candidates from popular websites directly into the Mingle applicant tracking system.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool allows you to quickly import candidates to your Mingle database while navigating the web. Just visit a candidate profile and press “Add to Mingle”.

Only works with selected platforms and partners. Ask your Mingle account manager about an updated list of supported platforms.

Features:
  • Create candidates with 1 click;
  • Automatically import profile information to Mingle;
  • Check whether a candidate is already in your database.

Requires a Mingle ATS subscription. Start your subscription on mingle.ro
